    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_90947</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Localiser le coucher du soleil</string>
            <string language="en">Locating the sunset</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lokalisieren des Sonnenuntergangs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontrando o por do sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Individuazione del tramonto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εντόπιση του ηλιοβασιλέματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Localización de la puesta del sol</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme peut être employé pour localiser la  direction où le soleil se couche si la période du coucher du soleil est connue.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram can be used to locate the direction where the sun sets if the time of sunset is known.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">direction</string>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">GMT</string>
            <string language="en">GMT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">coucher du soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sunset</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">temps</string>
            <string language="en">Time</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm kann benutzt werden, um die 
Richtung zu lokalisieren, wohin die Sonne einstellt, wenn die Zeit des
Sonnenuntergangs bekannt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama pode ser usado encontrar o sentido 
aonde o sol se ajusta se a época do por do sol for sabida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema può essere usato per individuare 
il senso dove il sole si regola se il periodo del tramonto è 
conosciuto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για να 
εντοπίσει την κατεύθυνση όπου ο ήλιος θέτει εάν ο χρόνος του 
ηλιοβασιλέματος είναι γνωστός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama se puede utilizar para localizar la
dirección adonde el sol fija si la época de la puesta del sol se 
sabe.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">GMT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonnenuntergang</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sentido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">GMT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">por do sol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">senso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">GMT</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tramonto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tempo</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
